title: The Backbone of life
creator_credit: Gus Mercurio Enterprises, Gus Mercurio and John Gauci
brief_description: Gus Mercurio has been a Registered Doctor of Chiropractic for over 35 years. These routines have enriched his own life and can do the same for you. The whole routine in 2 parts takes less than 40 minutes to complete and can be easily adapted to your day. Designed for the mature, it includes stretching and toning, low impact aerobics - walking, swimming or cycling - weight training and isometrics and relaxation. Proper sleep support and dietary advice are covered to make this tape a must for any-one suffering muscular or back discomfort.
